steps.name: User opens chrome browser and navigates to the url
Home page should be loaded
User scrolls down to Products section
Clicks on a product from the products list
Product description page should be loaded
Add to cart button should be displayed
User clicks on Add to cart button
Product added alert should be loaded
User clicks on Ok button from the alert
Clicks on Cart tab from the top nav bar
Cart page should be loaded
Place Order button should be displayed
User clicks on Place Order button
Place Order form should be loaded
User enters "Test" into the Name input field
enters "Bangladesh" into the Country input field
enters "Dhaka" into the City input field
enters "123456" into the Credit Card input field
enters "October" into the Month input field
enters "2022" into the Year input field
clicks on the Purchase button
Purchase confirmation alert should be displayed

Clicks on Sign up button
Confirmation alert should be displayed
